Other pages for this artwork cycle: 

=== Argas ===

Argas is a dark theme with turquoise highlights and features user-changeable colors.

=== Design ===

The Argas theme is a balance between shades of grey and black resulting in a theme which is easy on the eyes in any lighting condition.

=== Desktop Preview ===

<nowiki>[[File:ArgasScr.png|Click image to zoom]]</nowiki>

=== Download ===

** Theme: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Artwork/Incoming/Karmic/Argas?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=ArgasGtk.tar.gz|Download theme for GTK and Metacity]]</nowiki>

=== Installation ===

One method to install a Gnome theme is to open the "Appearance Preferences" dialogue under '''`System>Preferences`''' menu and click the <Install> button. Gnome will prompt you to select a theme which in this case is `Argas-0.1.tar.gz`. Once installed, select the ''Argas'' theme from the list of available themes.

=== Recommendations ===

The Mist icon theme fits into the Argas theme very well.
